description: Curated soundtrack for wandering Makati's museums — from modern galleries to hidden heritage halls.

items.name: Ayala Museum
items.opening_hours_text: Ayala Museum is open – 9 am to 6 pm from Tuesday to Sunday (closed on Mondays)

items.name: Yuchengco Museum
items.opening_hours_text: Yuchengco Museum is open – 10 am to 6 pm from Monday to Saturday (closed on Sundays and public holidays)

items.name: Prism Gallery
items.opening_hours_text: Prism Gallery is open – 9 am to 5 pm from Monday to Friday and 9 am to 6 pm on Saturday (closed on Sundays)

items.name: The Mind Museum
items.opening_hours_text: The Mind Museum is open – 9 am to 6 pm from Tuesday to Sunday (closed on Mondays)

items.name: ArtistSpace Gallery
items.opening_hours_text: ArtistSpace Gallery is open – 10 am to 7 pm from Monday to Sunday

items.name: Michel Yves Art Gallery
items.opening_hours_text: Michel Yves Art Gallery is open – 10 am to 9 pm from Monday to Sunday

items.name: Finale Art File
items.opening_hours_text: Finale Art File is open – 10 am to 7 pm from Monday to Saturday

items.name: Museum of Contemporary Art and Design
items.opening_hours_text: Museum of Contemporary Art and Design is open – 10 am to 6 pm from Tuesday to Sunday
